seo.defaultDescription: With BarterTap.az, exchange your unused items for free. Get new items without spending money.
seo.defaultKeywords: item exchange, barter, free exchange, second hand, used items, exchange, azerbaijan

search.placeholder: Search for items you want to exchange

step1.title: Add Your Item
step1.description: Add photos and description of items you no longer need.

step2.title: Make an Offer
step2.description: Find items you like and offer your items for exchange.

step3.title: Exchange and Rate
step3.description: Meet, exchange items, and rate your experience.

cta.title: Join Now and Start Exchanging
cta.subtitle: Thousands of users have already gotten items they need without spending money. Join the exchange movement!

footer.description: BarterTap.az is Azerbaijan's largest free item exchange platform. It allows you to exchange unwanted items for things you want and obtain new items without spending money.

errors.itemNotFoundDescription: The item you are looking for does not exist or has been removed.

unauthorized.title: Unauthorized Access
unauthorized.description: Login required to view this page
unauthorized.message: You need to be logged in to view this page. If you don't have an account, you can register for one.
